creator: ajMobileApps
descriptionHtml:
A simple Reminders app to remind!

The Reminders app is simple to use yet still offers more advanced features, such as recurring tasks. These are great for times when you want to set up certain reminders that you may have to remember to do on a daily, weekly, or even custom schedule.

Here are some of the features:

- Beautiful and simple to use interface
- Recurring tasks are added automatically
- Easily add and delete reminders
- Attach photos and videos to reminders
- Create lists to separate reminders into categories
- Easily move reminders to another list
- Multiple lists of reminders, bills, birthdays, tasks and more
- Disable ads for free
- Eight smart lists

Inside each of these eight smart lists, you can view reminders that are either due today (Today), reminders that are scheduled (Scheduled), all reminders (All), flagged reminders (Flagged), reminders that are becoming due in the next 7 days (Next 7 days), reminders and tasks that are prioritized (Prioritized), reminders or tasks that have photos or videos attached (Have Images), and tasks that are noted but not scheduled (Nonscheduled).

Try it and you will like it!
descriptionShort: A simple to use Reminder yet offers more advanced features for everyday life!
title: Reminders with Alarms, Notes and Photos

creator: ajMobileApps
descriptionHtml:
A simple Reminders app to remind!

The Reminders app is easy to use yet still offers more advanced features, such as flexible recurring tasks. These are great for times when you want to set up certain reminders that you may have to remember to do on a daily, weekly, or even custom schedule.

Here are some of the features:

- Beautiful interface and easy to use
- Eight smart lists to give quick view of all reminders
- Easily add and delete reminders
- Write notes and attach photos and videos
- Flexible recurring tasks are added automatically
- Create lists to separate reminders into categories
- Multiple lists of reminders, bills, birthdays, tasks and more
- Easily move reminders to another list
- Option to disable ads for free

Eight Smart Lists

Inside each of these eight smart lists, you can view reminders that are either due today (Today), reminders that are scheduled (Scheduled), all reminders (All), flagged reminders (Flagged), reminders that are becoming due in the next 7 days (Next 7 days), reminders and tasks that are prioritized (Prioritized), reminders or tasks that have photos or videos attached (Have Images), and tasks that are noted but not scheduled (Nonscheduled).

This is a completely free app! It contains banner ads and short video ads, we can assure that you won't see a video ads unless you tap the button. Should you tap to watch a short video, you will get 'star coins' which you can use to disable banner ads and to access features such as backup and restore data.

Try it, you will find it useful!
descriptionShort: A simple to use Reminder yet offers more advanced features for everyday life!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Works on Android 10 now!

title: Reminders with Alarms, Notes and Photos

creator: ajMobileApps
descriptionHtml:
Reminders app is perfect for reminding you of the tasks you want to complete. Set a one time or recurring reminder with notification and alarm in just a few steps.

Easy to use yet offers advanced features, such as creating flexible recurring reminders on a daily, weekly, monthly, yearly or custom schedule.

» Beautiful and easy to use interface (iOS style)
» Eight smart lists organize your reminders into quick views
» Multiple lists of reminders, bills, birthdays, tasks and more
» Create flexible recurring tasks automatically
» Easily add and delete reminders
» Write notes and attach photos and videos
» Easily move reminders to another list
» Option to disable ads for free


Eight Smart Lists

1. 'Today' shows reminders that are due or going to due today
2. 'Scheduled' shows reminders that have been scheduled
3. 'All' shows all reminders
4. 'Flagged' shows reminders that have been flagged
5. 'Next 7 days' shows reminders that are becoming due in the next 7 days
6. 'Prioritized' shows reminders that have been prioritized
7. 'Have Images' shows reminders that have images attached
8. 'Nonscheduled' shows saved events or notes that have no schedule


Confidentiality

This app can work without the Internet, and does not track your location. You can even turn off ads!

Reminder is brought to you by ajMobileApps and is completely free to use. Download it now!
descriptionShort: Lists of reminders, birthdays, tasks, notes, shopping, bill payments and more!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bug fixes and performance improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New features to check alarm, notification and Do-Not-Disturb settings
- Improved notification with color icon
- Allow settings in the app for alarm and notification sound
- Speed, stability and performance improved
We are always continuously improving out app, hope you've enjoyed using it, please leave us a review. Thanks!

title: Reminders with Alarm & Photos

creator: ajMobileApps
descriptionHtml:
Reminders app is perfect for reminding you of the things you want to do. In just a few steps, you can set a date and time to remind yourself of the things you want to do with notification and alarm. Jot down notes, attach pictures and videos in a reminder so that you will never forget!

You can have a reminder to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly or at a custom frequency. Choose the option that works best for you.


» Beautiful and easy to use interface (iOS style)
» Eight smart lists organize your reminders into quick views
» Create lists of reminders, bills, birthdays, tasks and more
» Easily set up flexible recurring reminders
» Easily add and delete reminders
» Write notes and attach photos and videos
» Easily move reminder to a different list
» Option to disable ads for free


Eight Smart Lists

1. 'Today' shows reminders that are due or going to due today
2. 'Scheduled' shows reminders that have been scheduled
3. 'All' shows all reminders
4. 'Flagged' shows reminders that have been flagged
5. 'Next 7 days' shows reminders that are becoming due in the next 7 days
6. 'Prioritized' shows reminders that have been prioritized
7. 'Have Images' shows reminders that have images attached
8. 'Nonscheduled' shows saved events or notes that have no schedule


Confidentiality

This app can work without the Internet at all, and does not track your location. You can even turn off ads!

Reminder is brought to you by ajMobileApps and is completely free to use. Download it now!
descriptionShort: Never forget birthdays, paying bills & others! Always remember and organized!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• New feature to allow backup and restore to share with other apps such as Google Drive and emails
• Added suggestion to troubleshoot issues in some devices where reminders are not working as expected due to battery saving and optimization in Android
• General improvement and bug fixes

We are always continuously improving our app, please leave us a review. Thanks!

• New dialog box to select reminder types.
• Allow selected reminders to be moved to another list.
• Allow selection of reminders that are marked completed.
• New color themes are available in this version.
• Support for Android 14, the latest version of Android.
• Improved app stability and performance.

title:
Reminders: To Do Lists & Tasks
1.8.21

creator: ajMobileApps
descriptionHtml:
Reminders app is perfect for reminding you of the things you want to do. In just a few steps, you can set a date and time to remind yourself of the things you want to do with notification and alarm. Jot down notes, attach pictures and videos in a reminder so that you will never forget!

You can have a reminder to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly or at a custom frequency. Choose the option that works best for you.


» Beautiful and easy to use interface (iOS style)
» Ten smart lists organize your reminders into quick views
» Create lists of reminders, bills, birthdays, tasks and more
» Easily set up flexible recurring reminders
» Easily add and delete reminders
» Write notes and attach photos and videos
» Easily move reminders to different lists
» Option to disable ads for free


10 Smart Lists ⭐

1. 'Today' shows reminders that are due or going to due today
2. 'Scheduled' shows reminders that have been scheduled
3. 'All' shows all reminders
4. 'Flagged' shows reminders that have been flagged
5. 'Next 7 days' shows reminders that are becoming due in the next 7 days
6. 'Prioritized' shows reminders that have been prioritized
7. 'Completed' shows reminders that have been marked completed
8. 'Repeats' shows reminders that are to be repeated
9. 'Have Images' shows reminders that have images attached
10. 'Nonscheduled' shows saved events or notes that have no schedule


Confidentiality 🥇

This app does not require registration, no need of email address or ID. It does not analyze any reminders or information that you entered, and does not track your location. It can work without the Internet at all, you can even turn off ads!

Reminders is brought to you by ajMobileApps and is completely free to use. Download it now!
descriptionShort: Never forget birthdays, paying bills & others! Always remember and organized!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
🌟 Always be reminded, never forget again!

Version 2.0.1
• Allow setting of the duration of alarm from 15 seconds to 3 hours.
• Support for smartwatch.
• Option to duplicate reminder on right swipe.
• Move item to Trash, auto delete items in Trash after 30 days
• Improved app stability and performance.

title:
